recipes.title: Orange Chilli Spaghetti
recipes.description: This might seem like a weird combination but itâ€™s more subtle than you would expect. You could even eat the spaghetti just like that without any vegetables.
recipes.rewardText: With this adventurous combination you found a way to create taste without using beef.
prepSteps: Make orange juice (or buy fresh from the store)

cookSteps.title: Spread cauliflower and cherry tomatoes on a baking sheet and crumble feta on top
Add garlic, chilli, cumin and paprika powder
cookSteps.detail: toast but don't let it burn ~3 min

cookSteps.title: Add orange juice
cookSteps.detail: bring to boil and simmer ~5 min

recipes.credits: Thanks to Cristina for this recipe

recipes.title: Aubergine Tomato Curry
recipes.description: A curry inspired by a Pakistani recipe. The aubergine is extra delicious if you first brown it on high heat. The original recipe is a dry curry without coconut milk, which also works, just add some water. You could replace the rice with quinoa.
recipes.rewardText: Curries are one of the easiest ways to leave out meat.

cookSteps.title: Reduce heat and add garlic and ginger
cookSteps.detail: medium heat, until aubergine is golden brown ~5 min

cookSteps.title: Add 2 TBL sp curry powder and 1 tea sp chilli powder
Add tomatoes
cookSteps.detail: bring to boil and simmer ~3 min

recipes.title: Green Lemon Spaghetti
recipes.description: A straightforward and fresh spaghetti. You could even leave away the cream to make it lighter.
recipes.rewardText: Popeye would be proud of your spinach power.

cookSteps.title: Add spinach, cream, lemon zest and pesto and lemon juice to personal taste
cookSteps.detail: stir and bring to boil/simmer ~10 min

recipes.title: African Peanut Soup
recipes.description: Tomato paste with chilli and peanut butter is a West African sauce for sweet potatoes, rice, meat or veggies in countries like Benin. You could also puree the sweet potatoes instead of leaving them in blocks.
recipes.rewardText: If you used beef bouillon, you created beef flavour without beef emissions.
prepSteps: Peel and cut sweet potatoes into blocks

cookSteps.title: Add 1 tea sp cinnamon and 1 tea sp chilli
Add peanut butter and 500 ml bouillon
